Package main.java.com.bcdipesh.controller

Class AppController

java.lang.Object
main.java.com.bcdipesh.controller.AppController
public class AppController
extends java.lang.Object
Handles user interaction of the view component by hooking its ActionListener to the AppView using functions provided by the Class.
Version:
3.0
Author:
Dipesh B.C.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    private class  AppController.AboutListener
    This class implements ActionListener and provides ActionListener object for the menu item about.
    private static class  AppController.ExitListener
    This class implements ActionListener and provides ActionListener object for the menu item exit.
    private class  AppController.LoadFromDirListener
    This class implements ActionListener and provides ActionListener object for the menu item load from a directory.
    private class  AppController.LoadFromFileListener
    This class implements ActionListener and provides ActionListener object for the menu item load from a file.
    private class  AppController.LoadPatternBtnListener
    This class implements ActionListener and provides ActionListener object for load pattern button.
    private class  AppController.SearchPatternBtnListener
    This class implements ActionListener and provides ActionListener object for search pattern button.

  • Constructor Details

    • AppController

      public AppController​(BytePatternMatcher model, AppView view)
      Creates a AppController Object that will link to the model, and the view passed to it.
      Parameters:
      model - Different Byte pattern matching operations will be done using this object.
      view - The graphical user interface to represent the model.
